body_html:
@peterjc123 I'm on a corporate network. I'm still having import torch issue.

I followed the advices on the forum - installed pytorch using pip3 (also tried conda installs), updated PATH. But have the following errors:
E:>python
Python 3.6.6 (v3.6.6:4cf1f54eb7, Jun 27 2018, 03:37:03) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "E:\Python\Python36\lib\site-packages\torch_init_.py", line 78, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: Access is denied.

the environment is windows 8.1 CPU. used lucasg dependencies.ext on _C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd and all dlls are found. Also tried ctypes.WinDLL to load some dlls ok.

Any ideas why Access is denied? By the way, I logged on with admin right.

here are further details from process monitor and relevant details regarding the access denied.

10:33:20.6247028 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_CREATE E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd SUCCESS Desired Access: Read Attributes, Synchronize, Disposition: Open, Options: Synchronous IO Non-Alert, Open Reparse Point, Attributes: N, ShareMode: None, AllocationSize: n/a, OpenResult: Opened
10:33:20.6247443 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_QUERY_SECURITY E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd SUCCESS Information: Attribute
10:33:20.6247647 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_QUERY_VOLUME_INFORMATION E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd BUFFER OVERFLOW Type: QueryInformationVolume, VolumeCreationTime: 21/07/2017 11:26:02, VolumeSerialNumber: 9EC1-8002, SupportsObjects: True, VolumeLabel: Dat?
10:33:20.6247893 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_QUERY_INFORMATION E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd BUFFER OVERFLOW Type: QueryAllInformationFile, CreationTime: 20/07/2018 10:30:00, LastAccessTime: 20/07/2018 10:29:57, LastWriteTime: 20/07/2018 10:29:57, ChangeTime: 27/07/2018 15:34:15, FileAttributes: A, AllocationSize: 13,094,912, EndOfFile: 13,093,376, NumberOfLinks: 1, DeletePending: False, Directory: False, IndexNumber: 0x80000000016ed, EaSize: 0, Access: Read Attributes, Synchronize, Position: 0, Mode: Synchronous IO Non-Alert, AlignmentRequirement: Word
10:33:20.6248153 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_CLEANUP E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd SUCCESS
10:33:20.6248425 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_CLOSE E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd SUCCESS
10:33:20.6249494 python.exe 5760 FASTIO_NETWORK_QUERY_OPEN E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd SUCCESS CreationTime: 20/07/2018 10:30:00, LastAccessTime: 20/07/2018 10:29:57, LastWriteTime: 20/07/2018 10:29:57, ChangeTime: 27/07/2018 15:34:15, AllocationSize: 13,094,912, EndOfFile: 13,093,376, FileAttributes: A
10:33:20.6250222 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_CREATE E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd ACCESS DENIED Desired Access: Read Data/List Directory, Execute/Traverse, Synchronize, Disposition: Open, Options: Synchronous IO Non-Alert, Non-Directory File, Attributes: n/a, ShareMode: Read, Delete, AllocationSize: n/a
10:33:20.6253065 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_CLOSE E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd SUCCESS
10:33:20.6258944 python.exe 5760 IRP_MJ_CREATE E:\Tips<stdin> NAME INVALID Desired Access: Generic Read, Disposition: Open, Options: Synchronous IO Non-Alert, Non-Directory File, Attributes: N, ShareMode: Read, Write, AllocationSize: n/a

Thanks,
Zhan

I followed the advices on the forum - installed pytorch using pip3 (also tried conda installs), updated PATH. But have the following errors:

Traceback (most recent call last):

the environment is windows 8.1 CPU. used lucasg dependencies.ext on _C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd and all dlls are found. Also tried ctypes.WinDLL to load some dlls ok.

body:
@peterjc123 I'm on a corporate network.  I'm still having import torch issue. 

I followed the advices on the forum - installed pytorch using pip3 (also tried conda installs), updated PATH. But have the following errors:
E:>python
Python 3.6.6 (v3.6.6:4cf1f54eb7, Jun 27 2018, 03:37:03) [MSC v.1900 64 bit (AMD64)] on win32
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in 
File "E:\Python\Python36\lib\site-packages\torch_init_.py", line 78, in 
from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: Access is denied.

the environment is windows 8.1 CPU. used lucasg dependencies.ext on _C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd and all dlls are found. Also tried ctypes.WinDLL to load some dlls ok.

Any ideas why Access is denied? By the way, I logged on with admin right.

here are further details from process monitor and relevant details regarding the access denied. 

**10:33:20.6247028	python.exe	5760	IRP_MJ_CREATE	E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd	SUCCESS	Desired Access: Read Attributes, Synchronize, Disposition: Open, Options: Synchronous IO Non-Alert, Open Reparse Point, Attributes: N, ShareMode: None, AllocationSize: n/a, OpenResult: Opened**

10:33:20.6248425	python.exe	5760	IRP_MJ_CLOSE	E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd	SUCCESS

**10:33:20.6250222	python.exe	5760	IRP_MJ_CREATE	E:\Python\Python36\Lib\site-packages\torch\_C.cp36-win_amd64.pyd	ACCESS DENIED	Desired Access: Read Data/List Directory, Execute/Traverse, Synchronize, Disposition: Open, Options: Synchronous IO Non-Alert, Non-Directory File, Attributes: n/a, ShareMode: Read, Delete, AllocationSize: n/a**
